definitions.title: n.pr.m.
definitions.body: (Yah comforts, LXX Neemiav (-ou), etc.;—n.pr. ([[ו]])[[נחמיה]] on Isr. scarab in BM, Cl-Gann:Jam 1883, Fêv.-Mars. 156 No. 42);—
the son of Hachaliah, governor of Judah under Artaxerxes Longimanus Ne 1:1, Ne 8:9, Ne 10:2, Ne 12:26, Ne 12:47.
ruler of half the district of Bethzur Ne 3:16.
one of twelve heads of people who returned with Zerubbabel Ezr 2:2 = Ne 7:7.
